definition: see 謎兒|谜儿[mei4 r5], riddle
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Write down the answers of the riddles below.
sentences.chinese: 猜谜语写出你认为正确的谜底。

sentences.english: He had racked his brain, but hadnrt been able to work out the answer to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 他已经搜索枯肠了，可是仍未找到答题的谜底。

sentences.english: So, the mystery of the Victory's last resting place had been solved.
sentences.chinese: 因此，胜利号最后沉没之地的谜底就被解开了。

sentences.english: The mysterious figure of the answer to the trilogy was only the third kick.
sentences.chinese: 这个神秘人物的谜底到了三部曲的第三部才被揭开。

sentences.english: Such events are very interesting, but the suspense of them cannot last long.
sentences.chinese: 这种事很令人好奇，可是谜底也不会迟迟解不开。

sentences.english: To get to the whole story, we have to record from hundreds of neurons.
sentences.chinese: 要得到整个谜底，我们必须录下数百个神经元。

sentences.english: If visitors have right solutions to the riddles, they will get a little gift.
sentences.chinese: 如果赏花灯的人猜中谜底，就会得到小礼物。

sentences.english: Before I open, a big brother first exposed the answer.
sentences.chinese: 没等我开口，一位大哥先行揭了谜底。

sentences.english: But thellonking is far different from laziness.
sentences.chinese: 没有最佳谜底但念考有很大区别怠惰。

sentences.english: The teacher was unable to educe an answer from her pupils.
sentences.chinese: 老师无法从学生口中得到任何谜底。

sentences.english: With luck, the causes of stuttering should soon be understood better.
sentences.chinese: 如果幸运的话，口吃的谜底将很快就会被揭开了。

sentences.english: The last student in each row will now collect the answer sheets. Everyone else is to remain quietly in your seat.
sentences.chinese: 最后的人同学起立来收谜底卷，其它同学安静坐著。

sentences.english: Now biologists think they’ve discovered the trick.
sentences.chinese: 现在生物学家们可能揭开了谜底。

sentences.english: Find ways of using the country's immense skills to provide answers to the rest of the world.
sentences.chinese: 努力用中国的谙练技术为世界其他国家提供谜底。

sentences.english: Other approaches are also shedding light on the question.
sentences.chinese: 其他方法也正在为人们寻找这些问题的谜底。

definition: to announce publicly/to publish/to make known/to disclose
see 謎兒|谜儿[mei4 r5], riddle
to guess correctly/to figure out the right answer
the whole truth is revealed (idiom); everything becomes clear
the truth about sth/the actual facts
as the water recedes, the rocks appear (idiom)/the truth comes to light
doubts and suspicions/a maze of doubts/puzzle/mystery
to float up (idiom); to become evident/to surface/to appear
